content.question: Which of the following statements is true about the role research ethics play when exploring how the evolutionary perspective explains human behavior?

choices.label: A lack of random assignment to conditions makes research in the evolutionary perspective unethical.
Psychological theorists have misapplied principles of the evolutionary perspective in harmful ways.
Human behavior is evolving at a rate that makes it improper to study in an ethical or fair manner.
It is inappropriate to equate the development of human behavior to that of other animals.

content.answer: Psychological theorists have misapplied principles of the evolutionary perspective in harmful ways.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
